<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Guardian Hub</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css">
</head>
<body>

<header>
<img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Guardian Hub Logo" class="logo">

  <h1>Guardian Hub</h1>
  <nav>
    <ul>
      <li><a href="#builds">Builds</a></li>
      <li><a href="#weapons">Weapons</a></li>
      <li><a href="#armor">Armor</a></li>
      <li><a href="#vendors">Vendors</a></li>
    </ul>
  </nav>
</header>

<main>
  <section id="builds">
    <h2>Top Builds</h2>
    <div id="builds-content">Loading builds...</div>
  </section>

  <section id="weapons">
    <h2>Top Weapons</h2>
    <div id="weapons-content">Loading weapons...</div>
  </section>

  <section id="armor">
    <h2>Best Armor Rolls</h2>
    <div id="armor-content">Loading armor...</div>
  </section>

  <section id="vendors">
    <h2>Vendors Info</h2>
    <div id="vendors-content">Loading vendors...</div>
  </section>

  <section id="ai-helper">
    <h2>Guardian AI Assistant</h2>
    <input type="text" id="user-question" placeholder="Ask about builds, weapons, armor...">
    <button onclick="askAI()">Ask</button>
    <div id="ai-response"></div>
  </section>
</main>

<footer>
  <p>Guardian Hub Â© 2025</p>
</footer>

<script src="js/main.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
